typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Déb. val.} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> articleHierarchie
source(output(
		{Hiérarch.produits} as string,
		{Désignation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> detailArticleHierarchie
articleHierarchie derive({N1.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 1, 2),
		{N2.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 3, 1),
		{N3.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 4, 1),
		{N4.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 5, 1),
		{N5.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 6, 1),
		{N6.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 7, 1),
		{N7.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 8, 3)) ~> splitGroupe
splitGroupe derive({N1.locale} = substring({Hiérarch.locale}, 1, 2),
		{N2.locale} = substring({Hiérarch.locale}, 3, 1),
		{N3.locale} = substring({Hiérarch.locale}, 4, 1),
		{N4.locale} = substring({Hiérarch.locale}, 5, 1),
		{N5.locale} = substring({Hiérarch.locale}, 6, 1),
		{N6.locale} = substring({Hiérarch.locale}, 7, 1),
		{N7.locale} = substring({Hiérarch.locale}, 8, 3)) ~> splitLocale
splitLocale, detailArticleHierarchie join({N1.groupe} == {Hiérarch.produits},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> N1GroupeDesignation
N1GroupeDesignation select(mapColumn(
		OrgCm,
		CDis,
		Article,
		Description,
		{Hiérarch.groupe},
		{Hiérarch.locale},
		Predecessor,
		Successor,
		St,
		{Désignation Statut},
		{Déb. val.},
		{N1.groupe},
		{N2.groupe},
		{N3.groupe},
		{N4.groupe},
		{N5.groupe},
		{N6.groupe},
		{N7.groupe},
		{N1.locale},
		{N2.locale},
		{N3.locale},
		{N4.locale},
		{N5.locale},
		{N6.locale},
		{N7.locale},
		{N1.groupe.designation} = {Désignation}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
RemoveColumns1, detailArticleHierarchie join({N2.groupe} == {Hiérarch.produits},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> N2GroupeDesignation
N2GroupeDesignation select(mapColumn(
		OrgCm,
		CDis,
		Article,
		Description,
		{Hiérarch.groupe},
		{Hiérarch.locale},
		Predecessor,
		Successor,
		St,
		{Désignation Statut},
		{Déb. val.},
		{N1.groupe},
		{N2.groupe},
		{N3.groupe},
		{N4.groupe},
		{N5.groupe},
		{N6.groupe},
		{N7.groupe},
		{N1.locale},
		{N2.locale},
		{N3.locale},
		{N4.locale},
		{N5.locale},
		{N6.locale},
		{N7.locale},
		{N1.groupe.designation},
		{N2.groupe.designation} = {Désignation}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns2
RemoveColumns2, detailArticleHierarchie join({N3.groupe} == {Hiérarch.produits},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> N3GroupeDesignation
N3GroupeDesignation select(mapColumn(
		OrgCm,
		CDis,
		Article,
		Description,
		{Hiérarch.groupe},
		{Hiérarch.locale},
		Predecessor,
		Successor,
		St,
		{Désignation Statut},
		{Déb. val.},
		{N1.groupe},
		{N2.groupe},
		{N3.groupe},
		{N4.groupe},
		{N5.groupe},
		{N6.groupe},
		{N7.groupe},
		{N1.locale},
		{N2.locale},
		{N3.locale},
		{N4.locale},
		{N5.locale},
		{N6.locale},
		{N7.locale},
		{N1.groupe.designation},
		{N2.groupe.designation},
		{N3.groupe.designation} = {Désignation}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns3
RemoveColumns3, detailArticleHierarchie join({N4.groupe} == {Hiérarch.produits},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> N4GroupeDesignation
N4GroupeDesignation select(mapColumn(

		{N5.groupe},
		{N6.groupe},
		{N7.groupe},

		{N2.locale},
		{N3.locale},
		{N4.locale},
		{N5.locale},
		{N6.locale},
		{N7.locale},
		{N1.groupe.designation},
		{N2.groupe.designation},
		{N3.groupe.designation},

N7GroupeDesignation select(mapColumn(

	),

	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['HIERARCHIE_ARTICLE'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sortieArticleDesignation
